sections.heading: Subpoena; nonresident witness; immunity from service of summons
sections.text: A witness shall not be liable to be sued in a county in which he does not reside, by being served with a summons in such county, while going, returning or attending in obedience to a subpoena.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 363, p. 454;R.S.1913,
